column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I have only gotten food poisoning one other time in my life
column2: and that restaurant (a Lettuce Entertain You restaurant) mailed me a $50 gift certificate. I still go to that restaurant this day because of their customer service. Â Because Bavette's is a high-end restaurant
column3: I would've expected their customer service to be on par with that... But it was not. Instead
column4: they implied that it couldn't have been food poisoning because they hadn't gotten any other complaints.
